{"name": "Northside Charlotte", "alternate_name": "", "description": "This summer from 06-16-2025 to 08-22-2025. 
The supervisor is Veronica Washington  (tel: (704) 302-3699).
All kids and teens ages 18 and under can eat for free.
Some meal sites may ask for registration to receive meals
Families can receive $120 in SUN Bucks grocery-buying benefits per eligible school-aged child on a debit-like card to buy nutritious food during the summer at grocery stores, farmers markets and some online retailers. Learn more and find out if your child is eligible at ncdhhs.gov/SUNBucks.", "email": "", "url": "https://summermeals4nckids.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "333 Jeremiah Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Mineral Springs / Rumple Road", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28262", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2854598, "longitude": -80.7803589}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 302-3699", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
